events.message: Customer called to report a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon on a busy street, requesting to file a claim immediately.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on the details provided by the customer.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the customer to explain the next steps in the process.
The customer received an acknowledgment of claim receipt along with confirmation that the case is now being processed.
Documents including police report, vehicle registration, and photos of damage were requested from the customer to support the investigation.
Customer uploaded all required documents, including the official police report and detailed images of their damaged car.
The claim investigation has officially started, focusing on verifying the facts and assessing the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming the customer's version of the accident and the documented extent of damages to the car.
An initial settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on damage estimates and policy coverage limits.
The customer responded with positive feedback, indicating satisfaction with the proposed settlement and support from the agent.
The claim was approved after resolving all pending issues and finalizing the settlement agreement with the customer.
Insurance payment for the repair costs was issued to the customerâ€™s account promptly following claim approval.
The claim file was officially closed after confirming that the customer received the payment and no further issues were outstanding.
